name: SavvySync
overview:
Acquiring beta users and customers is a challenge every start-up goes through.

SavvySync provides startups with targeted discovery of beta users and customers from the social web.

Whether a start-up is bootstrapping out of a garage, or enjoying the exhilaration of a capital raise, establishing a user base is key to the success of any tech venture.

The conversations, comments, and profiles on social platforms contain valuable information for start-ups. Within the billion of tweets lie data on user pain points, interests and habits. Similarly, LinkedIn hosts the skill-sets, industry knowledge, and clout of the largest professional network.

SavvySync sifts through Twitter, Tumblr, Instagram, Foursquare and LinkedIn to find early adopters that experience pain points our customers’ products solve. In addition, the search tool allow entrepreneurs to validate the problems they are trying to solve.

These insights allow start-ups to engage in meaningful conversations that maximize the chances of success.
